name: dupeGuru Duplicate File List
summary: Learn about .DUPEGURU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: dupeGuru is used to scan your computer for any duplicate files and then displays a list of all the duplicate files that were found. You can save this list as a DUPEGURU file or export it to the XHTML and CSV formats.

description: Duplicate file list created by dupeGuru, a tool used to find duplicate files on the user's computer; contains a list of duplicate files from a folder that have been detected by the application.
